pullrequest.title: Added support for removing sensors at runtime

content.raw:
instead of looping through all sensors and checking every iteration, a couple of ideas are:

* Use `EachRemoved` to check for entities that are removed in the `Sensors.cc` , [example](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/dd4ff2a4c1112a8727c12a2e927e87ca64392611/src/rendering/RenderUtil.cc#lines-889)
* pass another function callback, e.g. `removeSensorCb`, on `SetEnableSensors`. We could then invoke that function when entities are removed in `SceneManager`

‌
